skins.shipDescription: King George V-class battleship - HMS Duke of York.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am King George V-class' Duke of York. Scharnhorst? An interesting one indeed, but now, thou art the one who captures my interest the most... My... if thou displays such an expression to me, I won't be able to contain myself...
skins.acquisition: I see. So the scent that has been driving me crazy... emanates from thy soul. O sinful Commander who tempts me so, engrave my name upon thine heart - Duke of York, of the Royal Navy.
skins.login: O unclean snake, who is it thee lusts after today?
skins.details: Dost thy heart cry restlessly in my absence?
skins.secretaryIdle1: The secret behind my battle prowess? Hehe, I sink deeply into visions of the enemy torn from limb to limb. What follows is only natural.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Wales, dost thou intend to hunt the same prey as me?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Please be at ease and close thine eyes. Sink into my embrace, and let thy thoughts flow away.
skins.secretaryTouch: The night is both lengthy and brief. Come, blow out the light burning within thee, and accompany me into the dark.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ahh, how beautiful... thy eyes, normally placid, burning with the fires of lust...

skins.shipDescription: This luscious scent... doth emanate from thee. What dost thou feel when gazing upon my new dress? Hehe... thy lips may lie, but thy eyes do not.
skins.acquisition: This luscious scent... doth emanate from thee. What dost thou feel when gazing upon my new dress? Hehe... thy lips may lie, but thy eyes do not.
skins.login: Dost thou wish to try this blood... coloured fruity beverage?
skins.details: Ahaha... I can hear the beating of thy heart. Yes, throb, throb... Ahh, what an enrapturing sound...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Thou need not be nervous. This attire is but a temporary one... Perhaps thou believed to have escaped from my usual self? Ahaha...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Even though a night eternal may be out of the question, dost thou not wish... to sink into the embrace of night with me?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Following thy ideals are akin to swimming endlessly against the current... However, the way thou refuseth to bow thy head before fate gives me ample reason to remain by thee. Hehe...
skins.secretaryTouch: Dost thou intend to spend the night alone, or perhaps... wouldst thou like to partake of a drink with me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Art thou able... to entertain me a bit longer?

skins.shipDescription: My beautiful Adonis, why dost thou refuseth to take refuge in the trove of everlasting love... Perhaps my outfit can finally pierce thy heart? Hehe~
skins.acquisition: My beautiful Adonis, why dost thou refuseth to take refuge in the trove of everlasting love... Perhaps my outfit can finally pierce thy heart? Hehe~
skins.details: Love that can be robbed away holds no value. Only by becoming mine entirely will thou be worthy of my absolute attention.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Wales, thou shalt not take my Adonis from me... Hehehe, but out of compassion, I shall allow you to have a third of our precious time together.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Yes, thy gaze... So full of resistance, yet also ready to give in at any time... How thine eyes can keep me entertained for all eternity...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Thou canst not win, be it in the heated environment of this sport, or in the sweetness of my absolute existence...
skins.secretaryTouch: Beautiful, is it not? This outfit thou hath bestowed upon me is perfect for inspiring thy adoration... Is that difficult to understand?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: The snake devours the fruit ¡ª thy desires, thy true nature... I have grasped it all. Hehehe~
